title: Kidney transplants in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2018/19
summary: In the period 2018/19 , 2058 Kidney transplants were carried out in England , followed by 109 conducted in Wales .
England has by far the largest population of the countries in the United Kingdom , so it is unsurprising it has the highest Number of transplants performed in a year .
State of Kidney transplants in the UK Number of Kidney transplants in the United Kingdom in 2018/19 was an five percent increase from the Number that took place in the preceding year .
